item.name: Gold
item.desc: Gold that can be spent in the Store.

item.name: Shard
item.desc: Magical crystals that can be spent in the Store.

item.name: Arcane Dust
item.desc: Magical dust that can be used to upgrade cards.

item.name: Arena Coins
item.desc: A currency earned in the Arena and spent on Arena Chests in the Store. Inventory is capped at 4000 Arena Coins.

item.name: Forge Resin
item.desc: Collect 20 Resin to craft a Runecrafter's Pouch.

item.name: Common Pack
item.desc: Gives a Standard Set Common card or better!

item.name: Rare Pack
item.desc: Gives two cards from Standard Set with one guaranteed Rare or higher.

item.name: Epic Pack
item.desc: Gives four cards from Standard Set with one guaranteed Epic or higher.

item.name: Legendary Pack
item.desc: Gives four cards from Standard Set with one guaranteed Legendary.

item.name: Epic Pack Fragment
item.desc: Collect 1000 to craft an Epic Pack!

item.name: Legendary Pack Fragment
item.desc: Collect 1000 to craft a Legendary Pack!

item.name: Runecrafter's Stone
item.desc: Collect 100 Runecrafter's Stones to craft Massive Runecrafter's Chest!

item.name: Arena Trophy
item.desc: Collect three Trophies to craft a Double Legendary Reward Pack!

item.name: Endgame Seal
item.desc: Any extra endgame stones are converted into Endgame Seals.

item.name: ShardBot
item.desc: Gives 5 Shards, once per day. Also increases the Energy cap by 10! Item lasts 30 days.

item.name: Super ShardBot
item.desc: Gives 10 Shards, once per day. Also increases the Energy cap by 20! Item lasts 30 days.

item.name: Mega ShardBot
item.desc: Gives 25 Shards, once per day. Also increases the Energy cap by 20! Item lasts 30 days.

item.name: Permanent ShardBot
item.desc: Gives 25 Shards, once per day. Also increases the Energy cap by 20!

item.name: Recruit's Lockbox
item.desc: Contains special goods to help a new Adventurer!

item.name: Traveller's Lockbox
item.desc: Contains special goods to help a worthy Adventurer!

item.name: Explorer's Lockbox
item.desc: Contains special goods to help a hardened Adventurer!

item.name: Adventurer's Lockbox
item.desc: Contains special goods to help a seasoned Adventurer!

item.name: Runecraft Lockbox
item.desc: Contains a set of Runecrafting materials, lost by previous adventurers!

item.name: Runecrafter's Chest
item.desc: Contains 10x Runecrafter's Pouches, plus an additional guaranteed Rune.

item.name: Random Rune
item.desc: One random Rare+ Rune!

item.name: Runecrafter's Pouch
item.desc: Contains various Runecrafting components, and a chance at Runeshells.

item.name: PAX East Bundle
item.desc: A special bundle exclusive for PAX East.

item.name: Thank You Crate
item.desc: A special thank you gift for players who have supported Spellstone!

item.name: Thank You Crate
item.desc: A special thank you gift for players who have supported Spellstone!

item.name: Thank You Crate
item.desc: A special thank you gift for players who have supported Spellstone!

item.name: Grand Starter Bundle
item.desc: Includes four Steam Tempest and two Epic Packs!

item.name: Epic Starter Bundle
item.desc: Includes one Garganotos and four Epic Packs!

item.name: Legendary Starter Bundle
item.desc: Includes one Blazekin Dragon, a Legendary Pack and six Epic Packs!

item.name: Random Epic+ Rune
item.desc: One random Epic+ Rune!

item.name: Random Legendary Rune
item.desc: One random Legendary Rune from the Main set!

item.name: Random Epic Rune
item.desc: One random Epic Rune!

item.name: Runecrafter's Canister
item.desc: A canister that gives you the choice of Blue Fire Souls or Arcane Fragments

item.name: Massive Runecrafter's Chest
item.desc: Contains various Runecrafting components, and a chance at Runeshells.

item.name: Bit Heroes Promo
item.desc: A special card exclusive for playing Bit Heroes!

item.name: Special Event Mystery Package
item.desc: A choice of either a random premium Quad Legendary card, two random Tribe Health runes, or 500 Stones for a random Champion.

item.name: Random Premium Quad Legendary
item.desc: Contains a random Quad Legendary card from Premium Set!

item.name: Random Tribe Health Rune
item.desc: Contains a random Tribe Rune of Health.

item.name: Random Reward Champion Stones
item.desc: Contains 500 Stones for a random Champion from the Reward Champion set.

item.name: Random Premium Champion Stones
item.desc: Contains 500 Stones for a random Champion from the Premium Champion set.

item.name: Dual Frog Reward Epic
item.desc: Gives one random Dual Epic Frog card from Reward set.

item.name: Dual Elemental Reward Epic
item.desc: Gives one random Dual Epic Elemental card from Reward set.

item.name: Dual Angel Reward Epic
item.desc: Gives one random Dual Epic Angel card from Reward set.

item.name: Dual Undead Reward Epic
item.desc: Gives one random Dual Epic Undead card from Reward set.

item.name: Dual Dragon Reward Epic
item.desc: Gives one random Dual Epic Dragon card from Reward set.

item.name: Dual Avian Reward Epic
item.desc: Gives one random Dual Epic Avian card from Reward set.

item.name: Dual Goblin Reward Epic
item.desc: Gives one random Dual Epic Goblin card from Reward set.

item.name: Dual Seafolk Reward Epic
item.desc: Gives one random Dual Epic Seafolk card from Reward set.

item.name: Dual Insect Reward Epic
item.desc: Gives one random Dual Epic Insect card from Reward set.

item.name: Dual Beast Reward Epic
item.desc: Gives one random Dual Epic Beast card from Reward set.

item.name: Dual Mecha Reward Epic
item.desc: Gives one random Dual Epic Mecha card from Reward set.

item.name: Energy Potion +3
item.desc: Refills up to 3 Mission Energy.

item.name: Energy Potion +5
item.desc: Refills up to 5 Mission Energy.

item.name: Energy Potion +10
item.desc: Refills up to 10 Mission Energy.

item.name: Energy Potion +20
item.desc: Refills up to 20 Mission Energy.

item.name: Energy Potion +50
item.desc: Refills up to 50 Mission Energy.

item.name: Gold Nugget
item.desc: Adds 50 Gold to your resources.

item.name: Gold Bar
item.desc: Adds 150 Gold to your resources.

item.name: Bounty Refill +1
item.desc: Instantly adds up to 1 more Bounty.

item.name: Bounty Refill +3
item.desc: Instantly adds up to 3 more Bounties.

item.name: Bounty Refill +5
item.desc: Instantly adds up to 5 more Bounties.

item.name: Bounty Refill +10
item.desc: Instantly adds up to 10 more Bounties.

item.name: Bounty Refill +20
item.desc: Instantly adds up to 20 more Bounties.

item.name: Raid Refill +1
item.desc: Instantly adds up to 1 more Raid attack.

item.name: Raid Refill +5
item.desc: Instantly adds up to 5 more Raid attacks.

item.name: Raid Refill +20
item.desc: Instantly adds up to 20 more Raid attacks.

item.name: Dungeon Refill +1
item.desc: Instantly adds 1 more Dungeon attack.

item.name: Dungeon Refill +5
item.desc: Instantly adds 5 more Dungeon attacks.

item.name: Dungeon Refill +20
item.desc: Instantly adds 20 more Dungeon attacks.

item.name: Arcane Fragment
item.desc: Combine 20 Arcane Fragments to create an Arcane Ore that can be vaporized for 30 Arcane Dust.

item.name: Energy Curio
item.desc: Increases your max Energy by +20.

item.name: Scout Pod
item.desc: A small airship used to scout new areas and retrieve resources.

item.name: Heart of Blue Fire
item.desc: Increases your Energy recharge rate by 20%, increase your max Energy by +30, and gives a chance of finding Blue Fire Souls from missions.

item.name: Blue Fire Soul
item.desc: Collect 40 Souls and combine them to create a random card from Standard set.

item.name: Atlas' Spellstone
item.desc: Used in crafting to gain the Atlas card.

item.name: Solaron's Spellstone
item.desc: Used in crafting to gain the Solaron card.

item.name: Vulcanos' Spellstone
item.desc: Used in crafting to gain the Vulcanos card.

item.name: Titan Core
item.desc: Combine with a Titan Spellstone to create a Mythic card.

item.name: Inventory Expansion +25
item.desc: Increases the card Inventory cap by 25.

item.name: Deck Slot
item.desc: Adds an extra Deck Slot.

item.name: Elyse the Truestriker
item.desc: Upgrade Elyse the Ranger to Elyse the Truestriker.

item.name: Oda the Aegis
item.desc: Upgrade Oda the Guardian to Oda the Aegis.

item.name: Aria the Nightwielder
item.desc: Upgrade Aria the Necromancer to Aria the Nightwielder.

item.name: Decim the Pyrokinetic
item.desc: Upgrade Decim the Firebringer to Decim the Pyrokinetic.

item.name: Yuriel the Manashifter
item.desc: Upgrade Yuriel the Owl Mystic to Yuriel the Manashifter.

item.name: General Ursurio
item.desc: Upgrade Commander Ursurio to General Ursurio.

item.name: Embersoul
item.desc: A powerful mote of dragon magic found near the Seastone Citadel.

item.name: Rare Embersoul Focus
item.desc: Requires a fully upgraded Mysterious Egg and Embersouls found near the Seastone Citadel.

item.name: Epic Embersoul Focus
item.desc: Requires a fully upgraded Narix, Dragon Whelp and Embersouls found near the Seastone Citadel.

item.name: Legendary Embersoul Focus
item.desc: Requires a fully upgraded Narix, the Defiant and Embersouls found near the Seastone Citadel.

item.name: Mythic Embersoul Focus
item.desc: Requires a fully upgraded Narix, the Tyrant and Embersouls found near the Seastone Citadel.

item.name: Essence of Embers
item.desc: Consumes itself and the Essence of Gold to give 20 Embersouls.

item.name: Essence of Gold
item.desc: Consumes itself and the Essence of Ember to give 10,000 Gold.

item.name: Brinesoul
item.desc: A powerful mote of ocean magic found in the waters of Duskwillow.

item.name: Scylla's Pearl Focus
item.desc: A magically infused pearl that is used to summon the mythological sea creature Scylla, Sea's Torment.

item.name: Windsoul
item.desc: A powerful mote of wind magic collected from chests in the Arena.

item.name: Windsoul Focus
item.desc: A magically infused helmet that when combined with Windsouls can summon Verus, Arena Champion.

item.name: Tiny Mythical Flask
item.desc: Consume to get your choice of 2 Embersouls, 2 Brinesouls, or 10 Windsouls!

item.name: Small Mythical Flask
item.desc: Consume to get your choice of 5 Embersouls, 5 Brinesouls, or 25 Windsouls!

item.name: Medium Mythical Flask
item.desc: Consume to get your choice of 10 Embersouls, 10 Brinesouls, or 50 Windsouls!

item.name: Hefty Mythical Flask
item.desc: Consume to get your choice of 15 Embersouls, 15 Brinesouls, or 75 Windsouls!

item.name: Scyer, the Fury Mecha
item.desc: Unlock the hero Scyer, the Fury Mecha!

item.name: Inventory Expansion +5
item.desc: Increases the card Inventory cap by 5.

item.name: Mortagan's Spellstone
item.desc: Used in crafting to gain the Mythic Mortagan, Grave General.

item.name: Mortagan's Core
item.desc: Combine with a Mortagan's Spellstone to create the Mythic Mortagan, Grave General.

item.name: Shamanic Totem
item.desc: You gain the effect "Primal Mending" which heals your creatures for 2 every turn in battle. Lasts for 5 days.

item.desc: A flask of flasks containing all previous Frog Reward Champion Stones

item.name: Mist Pearl
item.desc: A pearl used by Seafolk raiders to strengthen their magic! Collect them to bolster your team in Duskwillow!

item.name: Snowdust
item.desc: Mysterious dust that is easily mistaken for snow, it can imbue magical items with more power. Collect to bolster your power in Frigore!

item.name: Infinity's Spellstone
item.desc: This crystalline orb thrums with raw energy. Combine with Heaven Feather to summon Infinity!

item.name: Heaven Feather
item.desc: Combine this feather with Infinity's Spellstone to summon Infinity!

item.name: Hero's Coin
item.desc: Used to upgrade battleground effects in the Gloomy Lands!

item.name: Purple Fire Soul
item.desc: The soul emits a faint heat and squirms beneath your touch. Collect to bolster your power in The Void Plane!

item.name: Dragon Breath Essence
item.desc: Combine this Dragon Breath with Zhulong's Spellstone to summon Zhulong!

item.name: Zhulong's Spellstone
item.desc: Beneath the Spellstone's shell, you can feel something stirring inside it. Combine with Dragon Breath Essence to summon Zhulong!

item.name: Honeycomb
item.desc: The Beetleton residents' cuisine grants Rayne's Spiritlings greater powers. Collect to bolster your power in Beetleton Bunker!

item.name: Cluster
item.desc: Combine this honeycomb cluster with Dune Hopper's Spellstone to earn a new card!

item.name: Dune Hopper's Spellstone
item.desc: This larva was crystallized within the walls of Beetleton Bunker. Combine with Cluster to summon Dune Hopper!

item.name: Mini Jellyfish
item.desc: The Mini Jellyfish are the power supply for the underwater temple. Collect to bolster your power in Pharos Temple!

item.name: Temple Crystal
item.desc: Combine this Temple Crystal with Pharite Snapjaw's Spellstone to earn a new card!

item.name: Pharite Snapjaw's Spellstone
item.desc: This fish egg seems to have a creature inside it. Combine with Temple Crystal to summon Pharite Snapjaw!

item.name: Fireshard
item.desc: The fiery fragment can instill new powers in latent gemstones. Collect to bolster your power in Fireshard Mine!

item.name: Metallic Fireshard
item.desc: The metallic fragment glows with a different energy than average fireshards. Combine with Cog Spellstone to summon Vali, the Thunderer!

item.name: Cog Spellstone
item.desc: This cog has some kind of creature in it. Combine with Metallic Fireshard to summon Vali, the Thunderer!

item.name: Breezy Wind
item.desc: This Elemental powers up the Celestial Orbs. Collect to bolster your power in The Celestial Vault!

item.name: Dawn Feather
item.desc: It's a feather from a legendary bird that only appears at Dawn. Combine with Spiky Egg to summon Eos!

item.name: Spiky Egg
item.desc: You can hear something moving beneath the egg's spiky layer. Combine with Dawn Feather to summon Eos!

item.name: Word Eater
item.desc: This little spirit is attracted to written words and glyphs, powering up Yuriel's Mystic Tomes. Collect to bolster your power in Skyhaven!

item.name: Liquid Fire
item.desc: The contents of this bottle are eternally bubbling, despite the glass being cool to the touch. Combine with Rimelight Crusader's Spellstone to summon Rimelight Crusader!

item.name: Rimelight Crusader's Spellstone
item.desc: The frigid feather has been carefully preserved in eternal ice. Combine with Liquid Fire to summon Rimelight Crusader!

item.name: Bonbon Sparklers
item.desc: Rock candy shaped like a small firework, it pops loudly when consumed. Collect to bolster your power in Goblin Rise Stronghold!

item.name: Goblin Gadget
item.desc: The goblins use this device to train dragons to obey them. Combine with Pinpin, Dragon Handler's Spellstone to summon Pinpin, Dragon Handler!

item.name: Pinpin's Spellstone
item.desc: This dragon egg Spellstone houses the dragon Broodus and his master Pinpin. Combine with Goblin Gadget to summon Pinpin, Dragon Handler!

item.name: Tropical Coconut
item.desc: The coconut has absorbed the nutrients and magical properties from the island's sandy soil. Collect to bolster your power in Forgotten Island!

item.name: Hollow Coconut
item.desc: This coconut is light, just a shell of a greater creature. Combine with Zind's Spellstone to summon Hunter Zind!

item.name: Zind's Spellstone
item.desc: This fish egg Spellstone contains the essence of the great hunter Zind. Combine with Hollow Coconut to summon Hunter Zind!

item.name: Golden Leaf
item.desc: Ground golden leaves contain enough energy to kickstart your airship's functions. Collect to bolster your power in Golden Crown Village!

item.name: Raw Iron
item.desc: Frogs who can stomach iron are said to grow steel skin. Combine with Stoneclad Toad's Spellstone to summon Stoneclad Toad!

item.name: Stoneclad Toad's Spellstone
item.desc: This Dawnglow flower is heavily coveted by the Golden Crown Frogs. Combine with Raw Iron to summon Stoneclad Toad!

item.name: Black Blossom
item.desc: Flowers that have absorbed The Void's power after being exposed to massive amounts of energy. Collect to bolster your power in Desolate Red Valley!

item.name: Obsidian
item.desc: Elementals can absorb this volcanic rock to grow harder skin. Combine with Gem Harvester's Spellstone to summon Gem Harvester!

item.name: Gem Harvester's Spellstone
item.desc: This Spellstone has a small lightning bug inside it. Combine with Obsidian to summon Gem Harvester!

item.name: Dragon Claw
item.desc: Dragons exposed to arcane energy shed their claw sheaths, which can be used as an energy catalyst. Collect to bolster your power in Tarragon Peak!

item.name: Mother's Fire
item.desc: Mother Dragons from Tarragon have the hottest fiery breath. Combine with Ignus' Spellstone to summon Ignus!

item.name: Ignus' Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone with a baby dragonling cracking from its shell. Combine with Mother's Fire to summon Ignus!

item.name: Gladius Coin
item.desc: Currency used to upgrade your gear and friends' abilities. Collect to bolster your power in Gladius Arena!

item.name: Angel Hawk Feather
item.desc: A feather plucked from an Avian so noble that he became an Angel. Combine with Habrok's Spellstone to summon Habrok, the Lance!

item.name: Habrok's Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone with a beating heart beneath the oddly-furred shell. Combine with Angel Hawk Feather to summon Habrok, the Lance!

item.name: Corroded Mist Pearl
item.desc: Mist pearls that have lost their power to summon Scylla. Collect to bolster your power in Duskwillow Rebuilt!

item.name: Dark Gold Key
item.desc: A key with the power to open a dark dimension. Combine with Messina's Spellstone to summon Messina's Choice!

item.name: Messina's Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone in the shape of a crumpled letter that has seen better days. Combine with Dark Gold Key to summon Messina's Choice!

item.name: Dark Honey
item.desc: The Beetleton residents' cuisine has been imbued with strange energy. Feed them to Rayne's Spiritlings to unlock their power in Distorted Beetleton!

item.name: Revolution Flame
item.desc: A flame of burning revolution. Combine with Warrior Karna's Spellstone to summon Warrior Karna!

item.name: Warrior Karna's Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone in the shape of a crumpled letter that has seen better days. Combine with Revolution Flame to summon Warrior Karna!

item.name: Enchanted Iron
item.desc: Natural Minerals in the Salt Wastes radiate with a special energy. Use them on the Temple Glyphs to increase their power!

item.name: Tadpole Egg
item.desc: A small egg with a tadpole inside. Combine with Sproutfrog's Spellstone to summon Sproutfrog Rainwisher!

item.name: Sproutfrog's Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone in the shape of a crumpled letter that Decim's dragonling took a bite off of. Combine with Tadpole to summon Sproutfrog Rainwisher!

item.name: Pillar Soul
item.desc: A soul lost in The Abyss. Send them to the Titans so they can recover their power!

item.name: Whitesail's Spellstone
item.desc: An egg left in a nest home of both a dragon and avian. Combine with Dragon Breath Crystal to create Whitesail Wyvern!

item.name: Dragon Breath Crystal
item.desc: A dragon mother's warm breath of fire, enshrined in a crystal. Combine with Whitesail's Spellstone to create Whitesail Wyvern!

item.name: Soul of Silver
item.desc: A budding Elemental born of wind and water. Collect to bolster your power in Stormy Seastone Citadel!

item.name: Avalanche Equine Spellstone
item.desc: An express request for the continent's finest Elemental Steeds. Combine with Elemental Residue to summon Avalanche Equine!

item.name: Elemental Residue
item.desc: Remnant stones carried by Elementals, now imbued with their power. Combine with Avalanche Equine Spellstone to summon Avalanche Equine!

item.name: Void Essence
item.desc: A bottle of Undead Essence combined with power from The Void. Collect them for Malchior to build his Defense System!

item.name: Void Flower
item.desc: A flower that has bathed in the unholy light from The Void. Combine with Reks' Spellstone to Summon Reks, the Forlorn!

item.name: Reks' Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone containing a former tragic Goblin King's spirit. Combine with Void Flower to summon Reks, the Forlorn!

item.name: Wyld Leaf
item.desc: A leaf from a tree that has grown with unnatural magic. Collect them and use them to fuel your Airship!

item.name: Fallen Crest Feather
item.desc: A Feather from the Fallen Crest order. Combine with Wrath's Spellstone to Summon Wrath!

item.name: Wrath's Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone containing an Angel of the Fallen Crest. Combine with Fallen Crest Feather to summon Wrath!

item.name: Void Remnant
item.desc: A leftover remnant of The Void. Purge them to fuel the ancient technology in the Swamp!

item.name: Dawnglow Flower
item.desc: An arcane flower from Dawnglow. Combine with Conjured Dragon's Spellstone to Summon Conjured Dragon!

item.name: Conjured Dragon's Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone containing a legendary dragon of water. Combine with Dawnglow Flower to summon Conjured Dragon!

item.name: Wisp Fragment
item.desc: A tiny spirit that can band together to become a soul wisp. Use them to power Yuriel's Tomes!

item.name: Bloodmist Feather
item.desc: A Feather from the lost marsh of Bloodmist. Combine with Bloodmist Harpy's Spellstone to summon Bloodmist Harpy!

item.name: Bloodmist Harpy's Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone containing an artificially made creature. Combine with Bloodmist Feather to summon Bloodmist Harpy!

item.name: Karthos Ember
item.desc: An ember from the land of Karthos, imbued with magical properties. Use them to power up the Karthos Crystals!

item.name: Karthos's Flame
item.desc: An everburning flame from Karthos. Combine with Slagspirit's Spellstone to summon Slagspirit!

item.name: Slagspirit's Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone containing an ancient spirit of Karthos. Combine with Karthos's Flame to summon Slagspirit!

item.name: Dragon Talons
item.desc: The spirits of dragon legends who died protecting Tarragon Peak. Receive their blessing by offering Dragon Talons!

item.name: Tropical Callstone
item.desc: A Coconut imbued with magical properties of a tropical island. Combine with Siren's Spellstone to summon Siren!

item.name: Siren's Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone containing the soul of a half goblin, half fish. Combine with Tropical Callstone to summon Siren!

item.name: Gladius Currency
item.desc: An ancient, now unused currency that still motivates spirits of the Fallen. Collect to bolster your power in Gladius Scriptorium!

item.name: Acquatic Soul
item.desc: A small creature found living in a Skyhaven pond. Combine with Noble Swordfish's Spellstone to summon Noble Swordfish!

item.name: Noble Swordfish Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone formed from a tear of Scylla. Combine with Acquatic Soul to summon Noble Swordfish!

item.name: Angel Plume
item.desc: A feather doused in the magical properties of Skyhaven. Collect to bolster your power in Skyhaven Assault!

item.name: Fiery Soul
item.desc: A soul forged in the lava depths of Tarragon. Combine with Herald of Judgement's Spellstone to summon Herald of Judgement!

item.name: Herald of Judgment's Spellstone
item.desc: A Spellstone formed between the earth of Tarragon and air of Skyhaven. Combine with Fiery Soul to summon the Herald of Judgement!

item.name: Element Soul
item.desc: A small spirit formed from the powers of Aether, Chaos, and Wyld. Collect to bolster your power in Conflux Convergence!

item.name: Void Soul
item.desc: A soul trapped in the Void. Combine with Shattered Spellstone to summon Shatterstone Anomaly!

item.name: Shattered Spellstone
item.desc: A collection of shattered Spellstones. Combine with Void Soul to summon Shatterstone Anomaly!

item.name: Red Feather
item.desc: An item found whilst adventuring in Red Feather Valley. These can be traded for Arena Coins!

item.name: Inscription Powder
item.desc: Combine 25 Powder to create a random card from the Reward set. Also used for Runecrafting.

item.name: Universal Extract
item.desc: Consume with 10,000 Gold to create two random Legendary cards from the Reward set.

item.name: Rare Runeshell
item.desc: The key ingredient for Rare Runes. Found during Bounties.

item.name: Epic Runeshell
item.desc: The key ingredient for Epic Runes. Found during Bounties.

item.name: Legendary Rune Sliver
item.desc: One of three slivers needed to create a Legendary Rune. Found during Bounties.

item.name: Rune of Minor Health
item.desc: Health +3

item.name: Rune of Health
item.desc: Health +5

item.name: Rune of Greater Health
item.desc: Health +30%, rounded up. Minimum +6.

item.name: Rune of Invisibility
item.desc: Invisibility +50%, Health +15%, rounded up.

item.name: Rune of Minor Barrier
item.desc: Barrier +2

item.name: Rune of Barrier
item.desc: Barrier +3

item.name: Rune of Greater Barrier
item.desc: Barrier +75%, rounded up. Minimum +4. Health +15%, rounded up.

item.name: Rune of Mass Barrier
item.desc: Barrier All +50%, rounded up. Health +15%, rounded up.

item.name: Rune of Minor Healing
item.desc: Healing +2

item.name: Rune of Healing
item.desc: Healing +3

item.name: Rune of Greater Healing
item.desc: Healing +75%, rounded up. Minimum +4. Health +15%, rounded up.

item.name: Rune of Mass Healing
item.desc: Heal All +1

item.name: Rune of Greater Mass Healing
item.desc: Heal All +50%, rounded up. Minimum +2. Health +15%, rounded up.

item.name: Rune of Minor Vengeance
item.desc: Vengeance +1

item.name: Rune of Vengeance
item.desc: Vengeance +2

item.name: Rune of Greater Vengeance
item.desc: Vengeance +50%, rounded up. Minimum +3. Health +15%, rounded up.
